data.comment: Today's referee, Massimiliano Irrati, has blown to start the match.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Bologna.
Free kick Lazio.
Throw-in for Lazio close to the penalty box.
In the minute 4, In Rome Bologna attack through Roberto Soriano. The finish is off target, however.
Massimiliano Irrati awards Lazio a goal kick.
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Bologna at Stadio Olimpico.
Throw-in for Lazio in their own half.
Lazio have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Lazio in the half of Bologna.
In Rome Lazio's Ciro Immobile is caught offside.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Lazio's Luis Alberto misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Bologna at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 18, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rome.
Riccardo Orsolini for Bologna drives towards goal at Stadio Olimpico. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Bologna's Rodrigo Palacio is whistled for offside at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 21, Lazio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Lazio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
In the minute 22, Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bologna needs to be cautious. Lazio have an attacking throw-in.
Lazio's Luis Alberto gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Olimpico. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Lazio.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
Nicola Sansone of Bologna gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 28, Massimiliano Irrati awards the away team a throw-in.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
Mattias Svanberg for Bologna gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 28, Massimiliano Irrati awards Lazio a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Lazio.
Massimiliano Irrati blows against Lazio's Ciro Immobile for offside.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Francesco Acerbi is booked for the home team.
Bologna's Rodrigo Palacio breaks free at Stadio Olimpico. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
Lazio have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 35, Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Bologna.
Bologna are pushing forward but Riccardo Orsolini's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rome.
Bologna to take a throw-in in Lazio territory.
Free kick for Lazio in the half of Bologna.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Bologna.
Bologna's Riccardo Orsolini attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 41, Bologna are coming forward and Riccardo Orsolini gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Lazio have a goal kick.
Simone Inzaghi (Lazio) is making a first substitution, with Gonzalo Escalante replacing Lucas Leiva.
In the minute 42, Manuel Lazzari is replacing Adam Marusic for the home team.
Ball safe as Lazio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lazio's half?
In the minute 45, Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Lazio.
Can Lazio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bologna's half?
Massimiliano Irrati will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Lazio have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
Goal kick for Bologna at Stadio Olimpico.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Stadio Olimpico.
Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Lazio.
Throw-in for Bologna at Stadio Olimpico.
Jean Akpa (Lazio) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 50, Lazio have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
Lukasz Skorupski is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Lukasz Skorupski for Bologna is back on the field again.
In the minute 51, Throw-in high up the field for Lazio in Rome.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Lazio.
Corner awarded to Lazio.
In the minute 53, Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Throw-in Bologna.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 54, Lazio take a 1-0 lead thanks to Luis Alberto.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Lazio in their own half.
In the minute 58, Free kick Lazio.
Takehiro Tomiyasu (Bologna) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
In the minute 60, Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Bologna in the half of Lazio.
Wesley Hoedt (Lazio) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 61, Bologna apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Riccardo Orsolini. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Lazio.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
In the minute 64, The home team replace Joaquin Correa with Vedat Muriqi.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a throw-in for Bologna, close to Lazio's area.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 66, Mattias Svanberg (Bologna) has received a yellow card from Massimiliano Irrati.
Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 67, Lazio to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
Massimiliano Irrati awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Bologna.
In the minute 70, Lazio have a goal kick.
Bologna needs to be cautious. Lazio have an attacking throw-in.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Jean Akpa for Lazio has been booked by Massimiliano Irrati and receives a first yellow card.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
In the minute 72, Bologna's Rodrigo Palacio gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rome.
Sinisa Mihajlovic is making the team's first substitution at Stadio Olimpico with Musa Barrow replacing Rodrigo Palacio.
In the minute 73, Bologna make their second substitution with Andri Fannar Baldursson replacing Mattias Svanberg.
Lazio to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
Free kick for Lazio in the half of Bologna.
In the minute 74, Massimiliano Irrati awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Bologna at Stadio Olimpico.
Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Massimiliano Irrati signals a Lazio throw-in in Bologna's half.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Lazio.
Lazio take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Ciro Immobile.
In the minute 76, That's a fine assist from Mohamed Fares.
Throw-in Lazio.
Bologna drive upfield and Musa Barrow gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lazio defender.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Massimiliano Irrati.
In the minute 79, Bologna pushes forward through Roberto Soriano, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 79, Andreas Pereira is on a sub for Luis Alberto for Lazio.
The home team have replaced Gonzalo Escalante with Marco Parolo. This is the fifth substitution made today by Simone Inzaghi.
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Bologna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lazio's half?
Federico Santander is replacing Nicola Sansone for the away team.
In the minute 81, Emanuel Vignato is on a sub for Riccardo Orsolini for Bologna.
Bologna are whistled for offside.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Bologna.
Can Bologna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lazio's half?
Bologna's Musa Barrow gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 83, Massimiliano Irrati awards Lazio a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lazio in their own half.
Lazio's Vedat Muriqi has run offside.
In the minute 88, In Rome a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bologna have a dangerous throw-in.
Danilo for Bologna gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 88, Lazio have a goal kick.
The away team replace Aaron Hickey with Stefano Denswil.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a throw-in for Bologna, close to Lazio's area.
In Rome Bologna drive forward through Emanuel Vignato. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Massimiliano Irrati signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Lazio's Ciro Immobile breaks free at Stadio Olimpico. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Massimiliano Irrati awards Bologna a goal kick.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Lorenzo De Silvestri puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
Federico Santander instrumental with a fine assist.
